learning_outcomes.description: Apply the fundamental principles of mine design - Analyse and interpret data for the design of a mine
Apply the fundamental principles of mine design - Design and optimise a mine utilising geometrical, geotechnical and economical design parameters
Select mining method for a deposit - Select a mining method most appropriate for a deposit
Select mining method for a deposit - Develop production plans and perform equipment selection
Select mining method for a deposit - Apply geomechanics and ventilation considerations
Select mining method for a deposit - Estimate the social, economical and environmental impact of the selected mining method and the project
Perform economic evaluations - Develop a mine schedule for maximising the project Net Present Value
Perform economic evaluations - Perform economic evaluations for a mining operation
Communicate effectively with and as a team - Develop teamwork skills
Communicate effectively with and as a team - Develop advanced written and oral communication skills
Apply appropriate software for mine design - Apply mine design and optimisation software packages
Apply appropriate software for mine design - Apply mine ventilation software to optimise ventilation

assessments.assessment_title: Final Hard Rock Mine Design Report
assessments.task_description: Final Hard Rock Mine Design Report. More information will be provided during lectures.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submission is via Turn-it-in on the course Blackboard site. Email submission will not be accepted. Assignments are checked via plagiarism detection software. Students will be contacted if a high similarity score is returned. ALWAYS keep a copy of your submitted assignment.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
